duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate new business by making outbound calls to contractors to sell them on Hearth’s vision for how our product will help improve their business
Own the entire sales process, from cold calling to conducting product demonstrations and closing deals
Enthusiastically make between 100-125 calls per day
Build and manage your pipeline from cold call to close in Salesforce.com
Contribute to our company’s revenue goals by meeting & exceeding individual sales quota
Propose new sales strategies to expand the universe of potential customers
